descriptionHTML:
The Fade Watch Face is a highly customisable Android Wear watch face with over 40 unique options and thousands of combinations to make it your own.
Fade Watch Face is designed to work with both round and square watches alike with multiple customisations options for each.


Color Faded Time
Hours, minutes and seconds fade together as time progresses to create a spectrum of color variations.


Full Customisation
Create exactly the look you want, change everything from color to size to opacity.
Change every option, choose your exact look, your favourite colors or your ideal information. Make it yours.
Not the greatest artist? Try one of the built in themes to get a quick look without the hassle.


Real Time Editor
See exactly what you're changing directly on your phone without having to look at your watch. Make changes and customise everything right in front of you.


Save Your Themes
Save your custom themes for quick access on your watch and phone.


Battery Efficient
Change frame rates and ambient mode settings to increase your battery life.
Go all the way from 1 FPS to 60.


Fade Watch Face requires Android Wear 5.0+, the settings application can be found within the Android Wear app.
comments: A nice face Aesthetically pleasing and lots of customization.  Unfortunately I have to refund the app because the lines in ambient mode interfere with the card preview.
Another amazing watch face This Wath face works perfectly with both circle and square watch faces, I fully recommend it to everyone that owns a smart watch.. For only 1pound it's a bargain
